ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and Thamud who carved out rocks in the valley-side,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And with Thamud who carved rocks in the valley;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And how did He deal with Thamud who hewed out rocks in the valley?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Also consider how He dealt with) the Thamud, who carved their houses out of the rocks in the valley.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the tribe of Thamud, who hewed rocks in the valley.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Thamud, who hewed out rocks in the valley
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (with) Samood, who hewed out the rocks in the valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Thamood, who hollowed the rocks in the valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And with (the tribe of) Thamud, who clove the rocks in the valley;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and with the Thamud, who cut out [huge] rocks in the valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And With Thamud who hewed out rocks in the vale,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and [the people of] Thamud, who hollowed out the rocks in the valley,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (with) Thamud (people), who cut (hewed) out rocks in the valley (to make dwellings)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Thamood, who hewed out the rocks of the valley?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Thamood—those who carved the rocks in the valley.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:9] and Thamūd, who hollowed, hewed, the rocks (sakhr is the plural of sakhra) in the valley, the Wādī al-Qurā, [rocks] which they used as dwellings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And with (the tribe of) Thamud) He says: and how He destroyed Thamud, the people of Salih, (who clove the rocks in the valley) of Qura;
